[00:00.00]Mistletoe - Justin Bieber (贾斯汀·比伯)
[00:02.14]Written by：Nasri Atweh/Adam Messinger/Justin Bieber
[00:04.29]It's the most beautiful time of the year
[00:06.41]
[00:07.03]Lights fill the streets spreading so much cheer
[00:09.83]I should be playing in the winter snow
[00:12.76]But I'mma be under the mistletoe
[00:14.71]
[00:16.02]I don't wanna miss out on the holiday
[00:17.90]
[00:18.80]But I can't stop staring at your face
[00:21.43]
[00:22.06]I should be playing in the winter snow
[00:24.64]But I'mma be under the mistletoe
[00:26.50]
[00:27.29]With you shawty with you
[00:30.58]With you shawty with you
[00:32.90]
[00:33.57]With you under the mistletoe
[00:37.29]
[00:39.76]Everyone's gathering around the fire
[00:42.77]Chestnuts roasting like a hot July
[00:44.77]
[00:45.49]I should be chilling with my folks I know
[00:48.16]
[00:48.69]But I'mma be under the mistletoe
[00:50.52]
[00:51.66]Word on the street Santa's coming tonight
[00:54.36]Reindeer's flying through the sky so high
[00:57.45]I should be making a list I know
[01:00.75]But I'mma be under the mistletoe
[01:02.77]
[01:03.54]With you shawty with you
[01:06.12]With you shawty with you
[01:08.71]
[01:09.38]With you under the mistletoe
[01:11.86]
[01:14.92]With you shawty with you
[01:17.89]With you shawty with you
[01:20.45]
[01:21.06]With you under the mistletoe
[01:24.64]
[01:26.22]Aye love the wise men followed the star
[01:29.91]
[01:30.60]The way I followed my heart
[01:32.91]
[01:34.80]And it led me to a miracle
[01:37.42]
[01:38.07]Aye love don't you buy me nothing
[01:41.37]
[01:42.57]'Cause I am feeling one thing your lips on my lips
[01:47.34]
[01:48.04]That's a merry merry Christmas
[01:49.39]
[01:50.64]It's the most beautiful time of the year
[01:53.63]Lights fill the streets spreading so much cheer
[01:56.89]I should be playing in the winter snow
[01:59.48]But I'mma be under the mistletoe
[02:02.52]I don't wanna miss out on the holiday

[02:08.41]I should be playing in the winter snow

[02:14.25]With you shawty with you
[02:17.01]With you shawty with you
[02:19.93]With you under the mistletoe
[02:22.68]
[02:26.11]With you shawty with you
[02:28.55]
[02:29.08]With you shawty with you

[02:32.13]With you under the mistletoe under the mistletoe
[02:37.00]
[02:37.65]Kiss me underneath the mistletoe

data.trans:
[ti:Mistletoe]
[ar:Justin Bieber]
[al:Mistletoe - Single]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:02.14]//
[00:04.29]又到了一年中最美好的时节
[00:06.41]
[00:07.03]街道上充满灯光，传播着如此多的欢乐
[00:09.83]现在我本该在雪堆里嬉戏
[00:12.76]但我已经站在了槲寄生下
[00:14.71]
[00:16.02]我不希望错过了这个节日
[00:17.90]
[00:18.80]可是我无法停止凝视你的脸
[00:21.43]
[00:22.06]现在我本该在雪堆里嬉戏
[00:24.64]但我已经站在了槲寄生下
[00:26.50]
[00:27.29]和你一起，宝贝，和你一起
[00:30.58]和你一起，宝贝，和你一起
[00:32.90]
[00:33.57]和你一起，在槲寄生下共诉衷肠
[00:37.29]
[00:39.76]每个人都在聚集在火堆旁
[00:42.77]烤着栗子 就像七月一样炎热
[00:44.77]
[00:45.49]我本该和朋友在一起的
[00:48.16]
[00:48.69]但我已经站在了槲寄生下
[00:50.52]
[00:51.66]街上传言今晚圣诞老人要降临
[00:54.36]天上的驯鹿在高空穿梭而来
[00:57.45]我本应该列一张自己的愿望清单
[01:00.75]但我已经站在了槲寄生下
[01:02.77]
[01:03.54]和你一起，宝贝，和你一起
[01:06.12]和你一起，宝贝，和你一起
[01:08.71]
[01:09.38]和你一起，在槲寄生下共诉衷肠
[01:11.86]
[01:14.92]和你一起，宝贝，和你一起
[01:17.89]和你一起，宝贝，和你一起
[01:20.45]
[01:21.06]和你一起，在槲寄生下共诉衷肠
[01:24.64]
[01:26.22]爱人啊，就像智者循着伯利恒之星前行
[01:29.91]
[01:30.60]我跟随着我的内心
[01:32.91]
[01:34.80]它让我见证了奇迹
[01:37.42]
[01:38.07]爱人啊，你不需要给我买礼物
[01:41.37]
[01:42.57]我已经感觉到一种炙热的情怀 现在你我双唇交接
[01:47.34]
[01:48.04]这是最好的圣诞快乐问候
[01:49.39]
[01:50.64]又到了一年中最美好的时节
[01:53.63]街道上充满灯光，传播着如此多的欢乐
[01:56.89]现在我本该在雪堆里嬉戏
[01:59.48]但我已经站在了槲寄生下
[02:02.52]我不希望错过了这个节日
[02:04.71]
[02:05.56]可是我无法停止凝视你的脸
[02:08.41]现在我本该在雪堆里嬉戏
[02:10.81]
[02:11.52]但我已经站在了槲寄生下
[02:14.25]和你一起，宝贝，和你一起
[02:17.01]和你一起，宝贝，和你一起
[02:19.93]和你一起，在槲寄生下共诉衷肠
[02:22.68]
[02:26.11]和你一起，宝贝，和你一起
[02:28.55]
[02:29.08]和你一起，宝贝，和你一起
[02:31.40]
[02:32.13]和你一起，在槲寄生下共诉衷肠
[02:37.00]
[02:37.65]在槲寄生下，我们深深一吻
[02:39.50]
[02:40.52]告诉我你也爱我
[02:43.43]
[02:45.17]//
[02:46.76]
[02:49.34]在槲寄生下，我们深深一吻
[02:51.40]
[02:52.20]告诉我你也爱我
